subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Chien-Ming Wang’s two scoreless innings stood out on a Wednesday night full of highlights for the Yankees, who moved into a tie with the Boston Red Sox for first place in the A.L. East.
snippet: Chien-Ming Wang’s two scoreless innings stood out on a Wednesday night full of highlights for the Yankees, who moved into a tie with the Boston Red Sox for first place in the A.L. East.
